title: Galio Healing Cheese Build
body:
{{item:3222}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3504}} {{item:3504}} {{item:3504}} {{item:3504}} 
http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/summoners/masteries/#o.MsUvOhqP.Hn68CXP00

Bulwark Heal = HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA.  Ohhh man.  Wow.  We're talking like 2000 life heals or something stupid like that.

That is all.

replies.body: Windspeaker's Blessing is useless on Galio for the same reason Athene is *partially* useless on him. His shield isn't actually a shield, it's an armor/MR buff.
He's talking about the self heal that he has, not the resistance buff it gives.

> [{quoted}](name=Celestial Bodied,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1HBpWvVK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-30T11:56:30.960+0000)
>
> He's talking about the self heal that he has, not the resistance buff it gives.

Yeah I forgot the strength modifier is in general.
